entry.title: Photos Post 13: Moments of Growth, New Albums and Galleries, Part 24

link.title: Photos Post 13: Moments of Growth, New Albums and Galleries, Part 24

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to bring to your attention one new album:
1. Shri Mataji's Family.
Please kindly share the news and the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 34: Special Events (after 1975), Part 02
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 2 Photos of the special event 1990-1209 Procession, before Public Program, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 2 high resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 2 Photos in the smallest gallery: Collection 1990.
Please kindly share the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
